entries.name: Draft Race Rules [Normal - Reverse Recruitment]
entries.description:
The Basic Any% Draft Race Rules for this Reverse Recruitment Patch:
https://forums.serenesforest.net/topic/87280-fe8-rr-with-creature-campaign-units/. Was usually run with extra changes to make the lord have +1 move and -4 con

entries.name: Draft Race Rules [Normal - Ranked]
entries.description:
The Draft Race rules for a Ranked format of FE8, also see this spreadsheet:
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Z2j8jEvqgmmRm819Sy6FhiYYqpTZJp4Z6sC_EBbaIKA/edit?gid=1843344260#gid=1843344260

entries.name: EP Battle Stats & Fast Movement without cleared save patch
entries.description:
Patch for FE8 that makes it so you see the Hit / Dmg values during enemy phase combat while using on-map animations.
Also removes the need to have completed the game to unlock fast enemy movement while holding A.

entries.name: RNG Script - MGBA
entries.description: MGBA version of the Lua script that randomizes the RNG String every frame.

entries.name: RNG Script - Bizhawk
entries.description: Bizhawk version of the Lua script that randomizes the RNG String every frame.

entries.name: RNG Script - VBA-RR
entries.description: VBA RR version of the Lua script that randomizes the RNG String every frame.

entries.name: RNG Script - VBA-RR + EXP Tracking
entries.description: Alternative varriant of the VBA ReRecording RNG Script that tracks how much EXP a configurable subset of units has gained in your save file. Intended for the FE8 Ranked Format.
